rooms.description: A spacious living area with large windows to allow natural light, eco-friendly materials and minimalistic design, integrated with indoor plants for better air quality.
An open dining space adjacent to the kitchen, promoting family interactions, designed using sustainable flooring.
Modern eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and natural light from skylights. Features a herb garden and recycling station.
A quiet, serene master bedroom with ample space for storage, a private balcony overlooking the pool area, designed following Vastu principles to enhance positivity.
Additional bedroom suitable for joint family members or guests, featuring a spacious balcony and eco-friendly materials.
A well-equipped bathroom with water-saving fixtures, incorporating Vastu considerations to ensure balanced energy flow.
Multi-purpose study or home office area designed for work-from-home setups, integrated with natural lighting and soundproofing features.

openings.description: Designed to optimize natural light entry and maintain energy efficiency, aligning with Vastu principles by positioning in an auspicious direction.
Provides access to the garage and garden area, enhancing connectivity between indoor and outdoor spaces.
Ensures safety while offering unobstructed views of the surrounding nature, designed to be eco-friendly.

openings.material: Reinforced steel frame with sustainable cladding
openings.description: Provides secure and ample space for two cars, including provisions for electric vehicle charging points as part of the eco-friendly initiative.

garage.description: Spacious two-car garage with dedicated charging stations and storage space. Designed with insulation to conserve energy.

swimming_pool.description: Eco-friendly swimming pool integrated within the outdoor garden, featuring a natural filtration system using aquatic plants and solar water heating.

vastu_considerations.explanation: The main entrance is aligned with Vastu principles to ensure positive energy flow.
Balconies are placed on the north and east sides for optimal sunlight exposure.
